title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.
instructions: Boil the spaghetti until al dente.
In a pan, cook the pancetta until crisp.
Whisk the eggs and grated pecorino together in a bowl.
Drain the spaghetti and mix with pancetta. Remove from heat and quickly stir in the egg mixture.
Season with salt and pepper, then serve with extra cheese.

title: Chicken Curry
summary: A flavorful and spicy chicken curry with a rich sauce.
instructions: Heat oil in a pan and sauté the onions, garlic, and ginger until soft.
Add the curry powder and cook for another minute.
Add the chicken and cook until browned.
Pour in the coconut milk and simmer for 20 minutes until chicken is cooked through.
Season with salt and pepper and serve with rice.

title: Beef Tacos
summary: Mexican-style beef tacos with fresh toppings.
instructions: Cook the ground beef and onions in a pan until browned.
Stir in the cumin and paprika, and cook for another 2 minutes.
Warm the taco shells in the oven.
Assemble the tacos with beef, lettuce, sour cream, and salsa.

title: Vegetable Stir-fry
summary: A quick and healthy vegetable stir-fry with soy sauce.
instructions: Heat the sesame oil in a wok.
Stir-fry the tofu until golden brown, then remove and set aside.
Stir-fry the vegetables until tender-crisp.
Return the tofu to the wok and add the soy sauce.
Serve with rice or noodles.

title: Pancakes
summary: Fluffy pancakes served with syrup and fruit.
ingredients: Maple syrup and berries for serving
instructions: Mix the dry ingredients in one bowl and wet ingredients in another.
Combine both mixtures and stir until just combined.
Heat a skillet and cook the batter in small circles until bubbles form on the surface.
Flip and cook for another minute until golden.
Serve with syrup and berries.

title: Caesar Salad
summary: Crisp romaine lettuce with Caesar dressing and croutons.
instructions: Toss the chopped lettuce in a large bowl.
Add the croutons and grated parmesan.
Drizzle with Caesar dressing and toss to combine.
Serve immediately.

title: Chocolate Brownies
instructions: Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F).
Melt the chocolate and butter together.
Whisk the eggs and sugar, then stir in the chocolate mixture.
Fold in the flour and vanilla extract.
Pour the batter into a lined baking dish and bake for 25-30 minutes.
Cool before slicing and serving.

title: Minestrone Soup
summary: Hearty Italian vegetable soup with beans and pasta.
instructions: Sauté the onion, carrots, and celery in a large pot until soft.
Add the diced tomatoes, beans, oregano, and broth.
Simmer for 20 minutes, then add the pasta and cook until tender.
Serve hot with bread.
